title: 1 Sans, 1 Serif
content:
This is from a really nice brochure by Purpose, for the business consultancy EFFP.  
I’m wondering about the all-caps sans and the all-caps serif on the page below it (some kind of Baskerville?).  
Thanks for any help.

-Rob

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020845im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2_fonts_6159.jpg)
author: BrooklynRob

comments.content:
It’s hard to be 100% sure, but the sans looks close to Akkurat Bold from Lineto:  
 [http://www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020845/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/ "http://www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/")  
(Although maybe boldened a bit?)
The serif is Baskerville, the one [from Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020845/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/baskerville/) probably.
